issue.title: [C++] Add API to parse URI query strings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already expose an API to parse URIs, but it doesn't handle query strings. Parsing query strings is required for ARROW-6720.
